FuncDef: This command configures the PCEP session keep-alive value. A PCEP speaker (PCC or PCE) must send a keep-alive message if no other PCEP message is sent to the peer at the expiry of this timer. This timer is restarted every time a PCEP message or keep-alive message is sent.

ParaDef.Info: the keep-alive value, in seconds. Values-1 to 255.
